body: Hi again Chien, Yes for the explanation of the underlying issue, it makes it clear. I´ve running some tests with the updated component and the simulations are running ok now :) Yet a new hurdle I encountered is that the 'Read EP Result' cannot find the csv file with the results. I checked the file path and they don´t appear to be there as if the simulation hadn´t run. Do you have any thoughts on that? Thanks, Alejandro [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/qmsUgHzH5lN6h6e4M9l-9mAEa3u9NLLSMYqrJjUZbiolQcT85ptz5XGT7YCxCWUWkAnvMz8w0T7vulnaauyQNEUYW6n6eaWf/LBHB01SkyRiseSetup2message.png)
